references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper is important as it elucidates the design space of diffusion-based generative models, providing key insights into their architecture and training which is highly cited in the current paper.
This foundational paper introduces Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPMs), which are the basis for many subsequent works, including the one distilling.

references.paper_title: Score-Based Generative Modeling through Stochastic Differential Equations
references.reason: This paper introduces score-based generative modeling via stochastic differential equations (SDEs), which provide a theoretical framework for diffusion models and is widely used.

references.paper_title: Improved distribution matching distillation for fast image synthesis
references.reason: This is a key paper directly related to the distillation of diffusion models through distribution matching and it offers insights that are directly improved upon in the current f-distill.

references.paper_title: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models (LDMs), which are a popular and efficient approach to diffusion modeling and is used by the authors for text-to-image generation experiments.
